pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diet Mendelian Randomization // Encodes several methods for performing Mendelian randomization analyses with summarized data. Similar to the 'MendelianRandomization' package, but with fewer bells and whistles, and less frequent updates. As described in Yavorska (2017) doi:10.1093/ije/dyx034 and Broadbent (2020) doi:10.12688/wellcomeopenres.16374.2.
